description: Statistics, lists, and number-based hooks that promise specific value

examples: 7 habits that changed my life (number 5 will shock you)
10 books that made me a millionaire (number 3 will shock you)
5 mistakes that kill startups (number 2 will shock you)
I analyzed 1000 viral posts and found 3 common patterns:
I analyzed 500 successful founders and found their secret:
I analyzed 10000 LinkedIn profiles and found what works:

patterns.template: After {number} {time_unit} of {activity}, here are my {number2} biggest lessons:
examples: After 5 years of building startups, here are my 10 biggest lessons:
After 1000 days of writing online, here are my 7 biggest lessons:
After 100 interviews with CEOs, here are my 5 biggest lessons:
The 3-step formula that doubled my productivity:
The 5-step formula that grew my following to 100k:
The 7-step formula that lands any job:
99% of entrepreneurs don't know this about fundraising:
87% of employees don't know this about salary negotiation:
93% of founders don't know this about product-market fit:

patterns.template: I spent {amount} on {thing} so you don't have to. Here's what I learned:
examples: I spent $50,000 on courses so you don't have to. Here's what I learned:
I spent 10,000 hours mastering sales so you don't have to. Here's what I learned:
I spent 5 years making mistakes so you don't have to. Here's what I learned:
12 productivity rules that will 10x your output in 2025:
8 money rules that will make you wealthy in 2025:
15 health rules that will transform your life in 2025:

patterns.template: It took me {time_period} to realize these {number} truths about {topic}:
examples: It took me 10 years to realize these 5 truths about success:
It took me 6 months to realize these 3 truths about content creation:
It took me 2 failed startups to realize these 7 truths about business:
Here's how I built a 6-figure business with just 3 tools:
Here's how I gained 50k followers with just 1 hour per day:
Here's how I learned to code with just 2 free resources:
The 5 skills every founder needs to succeed:
The 10 tools every creator needs to grow:
The 7 habits every leader needs to inspire:
